display_long_description:
Exercise the mind, body & soul in this fast-paced feast of micro challenges, high intensity boss battles and a concoction of collectibles that unravel as you jog across vibrant backdrops of color and joy.

# RUN FOR YOUR LIFE
Get physical with lifelike jog-in-place controls or stick with the less intensive arm-swing mode as you run for your life through the bright and stylish world of madness.

[media]


# MINIGAME MADNESS

Match, Catch, Pop, Chop, Hack, Slash and Bash your way through quick-thinking showdowns that block your path forward to each castle lair!                                

[media]


# HURRY, HURRY, HURRY
It’s a race against time as every passing second drains from the longevity of your beating heart.

[media]


# MASTER THEM ALL
Master all hazard and showdown challenges with the help of collectible character cards found throughout the world. Learn their weakness and let ‘em have it!

[media]


# SUBSTANCE AND STYLE
Unlock hands and tombstones to make a statement during your run, and even after death.

[media]


# LEVEL UP
Spend the RO (Royal Offspring) that you’ve saved from each castle lair on valuable upgrades to increase your sword, shield or heart duration.

[media]

# RUN FOR YOUR LIFE

Match, Catch, Pop, Chop, Hack, Slash and Bash your way through quick-thinking showdowns that block your path forward to each castle lair!                                

![{"height":1080,"type":"image","width":1920}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/86659801_2932247743583077_7417664589811237837_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=gbRGaTwIc1EQ7kNvwFmwy7k&_nc_oc=AdmBkl8L8efkcDi4yIO-aSaqMzV8zO1FQg2axLfGieFCSJKK87V7th1y3yJz2qIJnU8&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfKIDhv4vYELNFYtt5PzjdJBm5gbcIG2Fq_nHPH6ywMvGg&oe=68216CAA)


# HURRY, HURRY, HURRY
It’s a race against time as every passing second drains from the longevity of your beating heart.

![{"height":984,"type":"image","width":1748}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507165_447221264980420_8367178254206728213_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=adf7Iuz6od8Q7kNvwG0-QL_&_nc_oc=Adm5zbffAD945tUZzoFACwa7gn_oRTrqTA6Jz4NA6c30shvvFAIIQc8T9LoOxoIDiGo&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfJciEWraB74InOZsumzhSrVrJfNc6HU3bAtHJBh15WV9w&oe=68215D12)


# MASTER THEM ALL
Master all hazard and showdown challenges with the help of collectible character cards found throughout the world. Learn their weakness and let ‘em have it!

![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57570293_4078635569072597_4548948488473550523_n.png?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=80XQ4IazlPEQ7kNvwFN2kdo&_nc_oc=AdkJjem8kbVp66crZDIu_CgONIRmpv_5SziKlq114kUIJ6xXqVSLlGCysbEzNvP_hdc&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfJmaNo90w7RA1JoEDhTy5HUhmd2vcoVJ_gjhIzHp_84gg&oe=682163ED)


# SUBSTANCE AND STYLE
Unlock hands and tombstones to make a statement during your run, and even after death.

![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982723_2208705096178691_3774754884521119372_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=etpYEF3BfSoQ7kNvwH6d9Kk&_nc_oc=AdkSwg64xHg7Z4H66z5j9pGK10V8lS2DZQLX_DhDvscMa-G5DOKR3QLIFPPED_NFJK4&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfK_Htfe41t3FJDZry2PZ7n_F8jsMLUI2xuBYbKesRHHKg&oe=68217850)


# LEVEL UP
Spend the RO (Royal Offspring) that you’ve saved from each castle lair on valuable upgrades to increase your sword, shield or heart duration.
